word_mean: 淋巴：为淋巴管内之一种透明、浅黄色碱性液体，来自组织液。偶而由于有红细胞而呈淡玫瑰色，且常因脂肪颗粒而呈乳色。淋巴包括液体部分与细胞部分，大部分细胞是淋巴细胞。淋巴来自身体各部，经淋巴系统回流到血管

sentence.Network_en: There is a marked swelling of the lymph nodes.
sentence.Network_cn: 淋巴结处有明显的肿块.

sentence.Network_en: Lymph node enlargement occurs early in chronic lymphocytic leukemia.
sentence.Network_cn: 慢性淋巴细胞性白血病,出现淋巴结肿大较早.

sentence.Network_en: It produces lymphocytes, removes bacteria from lymph, and filters out foreign bodies.
sentence.Network_cn: 它产生淋巴细胞 、 排除淋巴管中的细菌并滤出异物.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in sense 2): from French lymphe or Latin lympha, limpa 'water'

means.word_mean: 1. a thin coagulable fluid (similar to plasma but) containing white blood cells (lymphocytes) and chyle; is conveyed to the blood stream by lymphatic vessels
